Main Module

Main module for Quiz Generator application. This module implements the main Flow following CrewAI best practices.

class quiz_generator.main.QuizGeneratorState(**data)[source]

Bases: BaseModel

  • certification (str | None)

  • topic (str | None)

  • quiz_generated (bool)

class quiz_generator.main.QuizGeneratorFlow(persistence=None, tracing=False, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: _FlowGeneric

Main Flow for Quiz Generator following CrewAI best practices.

This flow orchestrates the complete quiz generation process: 1. User input collection 2. Database initialization 3. Quiz generation using RAG crew 4. Results saving

Parameters:

  • persistence (FlowPersistence | None)

  • tracing (bool | None)

  • kwargs (Any)

collect_user_input()[source]

Step 1: Collect user input for provider, certification, and topic selection. Step 2: Collect user choice about the number of questions and their type to generate for the practice quiz.

initialize_vector_database()[source]

Step 3: Initialize the Qdrant vector database with documents from the selected certification.

generate_quiz_template()[source]

Step 2.5: Generate quiz template using the Template Generator crew.

generate_quiz_with_rag_crew()[source]

Step 4: Generate quiz questions using the RAG crew with the initialized database.

create_final_quiz()[source]

Step 5: Create final quiz using Quiz Maker crew to combine template and questions.

finalize_flow()[source]

Step 4: Finalize the flow and provide summary.

quiz_generator.main.main()[source]

Main function to start the Quiz Generator Flow.

This function follows CrewAI best practices by implementing the main logic as a Flow with proper state management and step-by-step execution.

quiz_generator.main.plot()[source]

Plot the Quiz Generator Flow for visualization.

quiz_generator.main.kickoff()[source]

Alternative entry point for the flow (CrewAI convention).
